physical_appearance:This is an image of a clip in a multi-video installation. There are six screens; the first from the left shows a group of Indian men gathered near a walkway with railings
 the second shows another group gathered for a picture
 the third shows some men sitting and lying on a grass patch
 the fourth an Indian lady posing in her hawker stall whilst a man stands to her right behind her
 the fifth shows two men where the man standing has his arm on the shoulders of the seated man
 and lastly
 a man who si mopping the floor.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is an image of a clip in a multi-video installation. There are six screens; the first from the left shows a group of Indian men gathered near a walkway with railings, the second shows another group gathered for a picture, the third shows some men sitting and lying on a grass patch, the fourth an Indian lady posing in her hawker stall whilst a man stands to her right behind her, the fifth shows two men where the man standing has his arm on the shoulders of the seated man, and lastly, a man who si mopping the floor.
